trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Groton
There were no other sightings in Groton on or around June 10th 2002
divs: Sighting Details When first observed it was a very bright lighthovering in the sky. It would then descend in a south to southwest direction athen take circular path and return to its original location. At times it wouldflash lights in a circular pattern and it would fade and reappear over and overagain. We at times have seen more the one going at a rapid speed in the samedirection anfd then about 6 planes started following the ufos until theydissapeared into the sky. Many more things have been observed.
